languages.text: "У каждого из них есть сильные и слабые стороны — вот пусть и дополняют друг друга".
"Each of them has their strengths and weaknesses — so let them complement one another."
languages.original_text: "У каждого из них есть сильные и слабые стороны — вот пусть и дополняют друг друга".

traits.locale_text: "Each of them has their strengths and weaknesses — so let them complement one another."
"Each of them has their strengths and weaknesses — so let them complement one another."
"Each of them has their strengths and weaknesses — so let them complement one another."
"Each of them has their strengths and weaknesses — so let them complement one another."

languages.text: "Jeder von ihnen hat Stärken und Schwächen ... Sie sollten sich gegenseitig ergänzen."
languages.original_text: "Each of them has their strengths and weaknesses — so let them complement one another."

traits.locale_text: "Jeder von ihnen hat Stärken und Schwächen ... Sie sollten sich gegenseitig ergänzen."

languages.text: "Her birinin güçlü ve zayıf yönleri var. O hâlde birbirlerini tamamlasınlar."
languages.original_text: "Each of them has their strengths and weaknesses — so let them complement one another."

traits.locale_text: "Her birinin güçlü ve zayıf yönleri var. O hâlde birbirlerini tamamlasınlar."

languages.text: «Todos tienen sus propias virtudes y flaquezas; mejor que se complementen mutuamente».
languages.original_text: "Each of them has their strengths and weaknesses — so let them complement one another."

traits.locale_text: «Todos tienen sus propias virtudes y flaquezas; mejor que se complementen mutuamente».

languages.text: “他们三个各有各的长处和短板，不如让他们联合起来，取长补短。”
languages.original_text: "Each of them has their strengths and weaknesses — so let them complement one another."

traits.locale_text: “他们三个各有各的长处和短板，不如让他们联合起来，取长补短。”

languages.text: « Ils possèdent tous des forces et des faiblesses : nous devrions tirer parti de cette complémentarité. »
languages.original_text: "Each of them has their strengths and weaknesses — so let them complement one another."

traits.locale_text: « Ils possèdent tous des forces et des faiblesses : nous devrions tirer parti de cette complémentarité. »

languages.text: 「どいつもこいつも長所も弱点もある。だから放っておけ。勝手に補い合えばいい」
languages.original_text: "Each of them has their strengths and weaknesses — so let them complement one another."

traits.locale_text: 「どいつもこいつも長所も弱点もある。だから放っておけ。勝手に補い合えばいい。」
